Title: Beauty and the Beast
Plot: Dexter must save a life; Deb has a confrontation with a key suspect; Quinn follows up on the similarities between Dexter and Kyle Butler.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Julia Stiles, Maria Doyle Kennedy, April L. Hernandez, Raphael Sbarge, Joseph Julian Soria, Brando Eaton, Saxon Trainor, Adam Harrington
